overview: A film by Dana Dveris and Max Schmitz about a long distance couple falling out of love, set in Northern CA. Charlie and Avery meet once a month in a rural town between them in an attempt to preserve their love. Over the course of six trips to meet one another, long-held secrets bubble to the surface and their relationship will never be the same.
tagline: A long distance couple meet once a month in a rural town between them in an attempt to preserve their love.
title: Let's Meet Halfway
